alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 4:44AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Wednesday: Doney Park 3 to 5 inches Flagstaff 4 to 6 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 6 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 3 inches Williams 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
